```{r include=FALSE}
library(rscpages)
library(dplyr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

client <- connect(
  # server  = Sys.getenv("CONNECT_SERVER"),
  # api_key = Sys.getenv("CONNECT_API_KEY")
  )

all_content <- client %>%
  content()

sample_content <- all_content %>% slice_sample(prop = .3)
```


![](https://source.unsplash.com/1920x1080/?forest "A random forest.")

## Components

### card

Highlight a single piece of content:

```{r}
sample_content %>%
  slice(1) %>%
  rsccard()
```

### grid

Show a grid of content:

```{r}
sample_content %>%
  rscgrid()
```

### table

Show a table of content:

```{r}
sample_content %>%
  rsctable()
```

### search & filter

To enable searching and filtering (via [Crosstalk](https://rstudio.github.io/crosstalk/)), pass the same data frame to the
search, filter, table, or grid components.

```{r}
bscols(rscsearch(all_content), rscfilter(all_content), widths = c(2, 2))
rsctable(all_content)
```
